testCase.name: Book model should be a valid Book
Book model should fail if no name is provided
Book model should fail if no author is provided
Book model should fail if no description is provided
Character model should be a valid Book
Character model should fail if no name is provided
Character model should fail if no book is provided
Character model should fail if center is not valid
Character model should fail if center is not provided
Scene model should be a valid scene
Scene model should throw validation error cast character to object id
Scene model should throw validation error because scene has no name
Work model should be a valid Work
Work model should fails because scene is not an object id
Work model should fail because character is not an object id
Book module - create swagger example should pass
Book module - create should fail validation cause no author is provided
Book module - create should fail validation cause no name is provided
Book module - create sould fail because no description is provided
Book module - create should fail because aft.user is not a valid role
Character module - create should create a character
Character module - create should fail validation cause no name was provided
Character module - create should fail validation cause center is not valid
Character module - create should fail validation cause book is not an id
Character module - create should fail because aft.user is not valid role
Scene module - create should create a scene
Scene module - create should fail validation cause no name was provided
Scene module - create should fail validation for characters with invalid object ids
Scene module - create should fails because aft.user is not a valid role
Work module - create should create a work
Work module - create should fail validation cause no scene was provided
Work module - create should fail because scene is and invalid object id
Work module - create should fail because character is an invalid object id
Work module - create should work even if role is aft.user
Character module - update should update a character
Character module - update should fail because aft.user is not valid role
Work module - update should update a valid work
Work module - update should update even if role is aft.user
Book module - update should update a book
Book module - update should fail because aft.user is not valid role
Scene module - update should update a scene
Scene module - update should fail because aft.user is not a valid role
authorization should create a jwt token
authorization should verify a valid token
authorization should fail with code E4 for invalid role in token
authorization should fail with code E3 for an invalid token
authorization should fail with code E1 for no token
authorization should fail with code E4 for non admin role
authorization should fail with code E4 for non editor role
authorization should fail with code E4 for non allowed role
Scene module - delete should delete a scene
Scene module - delete should fail because aft.user is not valid role
User model should be a valid User
User model should reject an invalid User role
getOptions should match the given options
createMetadata should match return for a creation from an user on a date
createMetadata should match return for an updating metadata by the same user
createMetadata should match return for an updating metadata by another user
Work module - delete should delete a work
Work module - delete should fail if role is not valid
throwAftError errorCodes Check that error codes have been created correctly.
throwAftError General errors should fail with code E31 and status 404 in case of model not found
throwAftError General errors should fail with code E32 and status 400 in case of invalid request body
throwAftError General errors should fail with code E33 and status 422 in case of invalid data
throwAftError Mongoose Errors should fail with code E201 and status 400 in case of mongo validation error
throwAftError Mongoose Errors should fail with code E202 and status 409 in case of mongo writing error
throwAftError Mongoose Errors should fail with code E203 and status 500 in case of unknown mongo error
throwAftError Mongoose Errors should fail with code E204 and status 401 in case of mongo unauthorized operation
Character module - delete should delete a character
Character module - delete should fail because aft.user is not valid role
Book module - delete should delete a book
Book module - delete should fail because aft.user is not valid role
Authorization Controller Generate token should return a token
passwordEncryption should correctly encrypt a password
passwordEncryption should fail to validate a password
